initial_question.title: The frontend doesn't show
initial_question.body:
Hi !
I'm trying to run the frontend with the `npm run dev` but when it get launched I get a white screen. I also get this in my developper console :

`Uncaught (in promise) DOMException: An invalid or illegal string was specified`
`setupWebSocket client:536`
`fallback client:509`
`setupWebSocket client:555`
`setupWebSocket client:552`
`<anonymous> client:531`
`client:536`
`setupWebSocket client:536`
`fallback client:509`
`setupWebSocket client:555`
`(Asynchrone : EventListener.handleEvent)`
`setupWebSocket client:552`
`<anonyme> client:531`

I guess he doesn't really like it 😅 
If you know how to sole this problem it would be great, thanks by advance <3

satisfaction_conditions: Application functions in at least one supported browser
